name: Destiny: Cayde-6's Redemption (DLC)
description:
The premise is similar to Super Mario Sunshine: Cayde-6 has this doppleganger called Cayde-9, and he's been blaming Cayde-6 for his crimes. This is what the turmoil leads to: the inevitable showdown between Cayde-6 and his unsavory doppleganger.

Music used:"Vs. Ridley (Brawl) - Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Music Extended"

SFX used: "I am dead, not big surprise (SMG4 sfx)"
